sentences.english: Over the mountains, and under the sky-riding dirty grey horses, go you and I.
sentences.chinese: 在山區，天空下騎骯髒的灰色馬，去你和我。

sentences.english: Dishing the Dirt is a documentary series broadcast on ITV1.
sentences.chinese: 骯髒的食物是ITV1臺的系列紀錄片。

sentences.english: The landscape will get more cluttered, the air and water even dirtier.
sentences.chinese: 景色會變得更加雜亂，空氣和水也會變得愈發骯髒。

sentences.english: This is more like the Creeping Crud.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的要更象是”匍匐前進的骯髒東西“。

sentences.english: Dirty air or air-borne garbage causes stinging eyes and running nose.
sentences.chinese: 骯髒的空氣或空氣傳播的垃圾引起眼睛刺痛和流鼻涕。

sentences.english: Would you help a dirty migrant worker stand up when he falls down?
sentences.chinese: 當一個骯髒的民工摔倒時，你會去扶他站起來嗎？

sentences.english: What a filthy behavior! Fucking person it is.
sentences.chinese: 真他媽骯髒的行爲，爛人一個。

sentences.english: The bathroom looked dirty and the bedsheets were cheap.
sentences.chinese: 浴室看起來骯髒和牀單都很便宜。

sentences.english: Shadow disjoin dirty ash into the night…
sentences.chinese: 陰影將骯髒的灰燼分離至夜晚。

sentences.english: Iv He had uncombed hair, dirty clothes, and only 35 cents in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他頭髮凌亂，衣衫骯髒，口袋裏僅有35美分。

sentences.english: When you say that I murdered him treacherously and foully , you lie.
sentences.chinese: 你說我狡猾而骯髒地謀殺了他時，你說的是謊言。

sentences.english: I can never find those beastly little blue packets.
sentences.chinese: 那些骯髒的藍色小盒我無法找到。

sentences.english: He got up abruptly and tried to see himself in the dirty looking- glass over the wash-stand.
sentences.chinese: 他猛然站起身來，想在盟洗臺的骯髒鏡子裏看看自己。

sentences.english: Even if you can get past the dirtiness, the guy apparently only eats crickets.
sentences.chinese: 即使你能接受他的骯髒，還有一點，他只吃蟋蟀。

sentences.english: I have washed my hands of the whole sordid business .
sentences.chinese: 我已經徹底洗手不幹所有的骯髒的勾當了。

sentences.english: Sophie Neveu seemed far too solid of character to be mixed up in something that sordid.
sentences.chinese: 索菲看上去很純潔，應該不會參與這樣的骯髒交易。

definition: bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
